titleStmt.title: The damning nature of rebellion, or, The universal unlawfulness of resistance under pain of damnation, in the saddest sense asserted in a sermon preached at the cathedral of Norwich, May 29, 1685, being the anniversary-day of the birth of His late Majesty Charles II, and of the happy restauration both of him and of the government from the great rebellion / by William Jegon ...
titleStmt.author: Jegon, William, 1650-1710.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
